# Introduction

This vignette contains all the details about the current UQ4Covid MetaWards implementation. It consists of various sections that can be accessed through the tabs below:

* [**Quick Start Guide**](./RunningForDummies.html): contains instructions about how to install and run this version of MetaWards.
* [**Model Description**](./ModelDescription.html): A short guide to the model inputs and outputs.
* [MetaWards setup](./MetaWardsModel.html): A more detailed guide to the ins-and-outs of the model structure, and details of the implementation.

**All necessary files can be downloaded from [here](../metawards.zip).**
